maxDiceCount.name: Maximum dice thrown:
maxDiceCount.hint: Maximum number of dice you can throw using the Dice Roller. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 25. Changes require reload.

enableCoins.name: Enable coin tosses
enableCoins.hint: For making coin flips (similar to D2 dice rolls).

enableFudgeDice.name: Enable 'Fudge Dice'
enableFudgeDice.hint: For rolling 'Fudge Dice' (also known as 'Fate Dice') for your Fate and Fudge games.

enableSpecialDiceToggles.name: Add Special Dice Toggles
enableSpecialDiceToggles.hint: Add control options for hidden rolls. Adds mutualy exclusive Exploding Dice on highest roll (not for coin flips, Fudge or d100 rolls). Changes require reload.

enableFirstColumn.name: Add additional 1st column for 1 die rolls
enableFirstColumn.hint: Note: the dice-icon column is always clickable, similar to other online tabletop platfroms.

closeFormOnRoll.name: Enable closing Dice Roller on successful roll
closeFormOnRoll.hint: If enabled, the Dice Roller form will close and focus will return to the default controls menu option.
